data.title: Irwin Winkler
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Irwin Winkler on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 100% Round Midnight (1986)

Lowest Rated: 7% Nickelodeon (1976)

Birthday: May 25, 1931

Birthplace: New York, New York, USA

At once genial and candid, producer-turned-director Irwin Winkler brought to the big screen some of the most iconic films in the history of motion pictures. With producing credits that included "Rocky" (1976), "Raging Bull" (1980) and "Goodfellas" (1990), Winkler landed a spot on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2000, assuring his stature as one of the steadiest filmmakers in the late 20th century.

Photos

Irwin Winkler at arrivals for SILENCE Premiere, Directors Guild of America (DGA) Theater, Los Angeles, CA January 5, 2017. Photo By: Dee Cercone/Everett Collection REVOLUTION, producer Irwin Winkler, director Hugh Hudson, on location, 1985, (c)Warner Brothers / THE NET, director Irwin Winkler, on-set, 1995, ©Columbia TriStar . HOME OF THE BRAVE, Jessica Biel, producer/director Irwin Winkler, on set, 2006. ©MGM NIGHT AND THE CITY, Robert Deniro being directed by Irwin Winkler, 1992 20th Century Fox/ LIFE AS A HOUSE, Kevin Kline, Hayden Christensen, director Irwin Winkler on the set, 2001 ENOUGH, Jennifer Lopez, producer Irwin Winkler on the set, 2002 (c) Columbia. .
